title: DDFP 594: NFC East & West Previews and the Steelers' new additions
itunes:title: DDFP 594: NFC East & West Previews and the Steelers' new additions
description:
Dave Dameshek, Cynthia Frelund and Handsome Hank preview the NFC East and NFC West and give their predictions on who will win in each division. Also, the fellas and Cynthia provide their thoughts on how Joe Haden and Vance McDonald will fit in with the Pittsburgh Steelers this season. Then, Shek and the gang go division-by-division picking their favorite and least favorite uniforms.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
